{{pageTitle + ': ' + specialEvent?.name}}
ProgramID Event Name Description
import { Component,OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { ISpecialEvents } from './ISpecialEvents'; @Component({ templateUrl: './special-events.component.html', styleUrls: ['./services-list.component.css'] }) export class SpecialEventsComponent implements OnInit { pageTitle: string = "Special Events for Counseling Service" specialEvent: ISpecialEvents | undefined; constructor(private route: ActivatedRoute) { } ngOnInit(): void { const id = Number(this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('id')) this.pageTitle += `: ${id}`; this.specialEvent = { 'id': id, 'name': 'Paws', 'counselor': 'Brian Brackett', 'description' : 'Dog walking service for local shelters' } } ngOnDestroy() { //this.sub.unsubscribe(); } }
